# Motivation Language: How Your Profile Drives Momentum

Your brain has a preferred way to stay motivated. We call this your Motivation Language.

This article explains the five styles and how to use them:

- Progress (Architect): You move when you can see measurable steps.
- Rewards (Achiever): You thrive with celebration and payoff.
- Affirmation (Encourager): You grow when supported and believed in.
- Accountability (Connector): You deliver when others are counting on you.
- Purpose (Visionary): You become unstoppable when work serves a bigger meaning.

## How the quiz works

The quiz maps your choices to categories using option-to-category mappings. Results can be single, dual, or multi-profile depending on how close your scores are.

## What to do with your result

- Design habits around your dominant style.
- Blend your secondary style for tricky projects.
- Set up environments that **remove friction** and **boost your style’s strengths**.

## Next steps

- Take the Motivation Language Quiz.
- Ask the AI to help design a weekly plan using your profile.
- Revisit in 4–6 weeks and compare patterns.
